original_title: Lou Reed, John Cale & Nico – Le Bataclan '72
overview: The concert recorded at the Bataclan on January 29, 1972  marked the first appearance on stage of Lou Reed and John Cale (two of the legendary members of The Velvet Underground), alongside the singer Nico, after the separation of the Velvet Underground in the late 1960s.
title: Lou Reed, John Cale & Nico – Le Bataclan '72
